description: This file defines a React component named NotesPage that displays a list of notes, handles deletion with confirmation and optimistic UI updates, and provides navigation links for creating new notes. It interacts with custom hooks and performs fetch requests to simulate backend operations.

methods.name: NotesPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the notes management page, including note list, delete functionality, and navigation.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Callback function invoked when a note is to be deleted, performing optimistic update and attempting to sync with backend.
